title.rendered: Charitable concert in commemoration of the Heavenly Hundred (video)

content.rendered:
A charitable concert organized by the Embassy of Ukraine in the USA / Посольство України в США​ and United Help Ukraine in memory of the fallen Heroes of the Heavenly Hundred was held on March 3 at the Ukrainian Embassy in Washington. Andrei Pidkivka and Solomia Gorokhivska of ensemble Gerdan, joined by pianist Andrew Kraus, performed works by Skoryk, Gershwin, Schumann, Bortkiewicz, and others.

The concert was attended by approximately 100 guests, and we raised $7,250 to benefit two wounded Ukrainian defenders.

Team United Help Ukraine would like to express our appreciation to Gerdan and Andrew Kraus for their warm and inspiring performance. We are grateful to the Embassy of Ukraine for opening doors and welcoming the community and thank all the guests who joined us for the event.

Chastime video report of the event:

Myroslav Skoryk “Spanish Song” (cellphone video, posted by Andrew Kraus):
